snippet: Commissioner Bud Selig will watch from home Friday as his latest legacy item, the wild-card play-in game, unfolds in Atlanta and Arlington, Tex.
abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column; MLB commissoner Bud Selig will watch from home as his latest legacy item, the wild-card play-in game, unfolds in Atlanta and Arlington, Tex; Selig, for all the strife of his two decades as commissioner, has now overseen two successful expansions of the playoff format.
lead_paragraph: Commissioner Bud Selig will watch from home Friday as his latest legacy item, the wild-card play-in game, unfolds in Atlanta and Arlington, Tex.

headline.seo: In Wild-Card Play-In Game, It’s Win or You’re Out
headline.main: In Wild-Card Play-In Game, It’s Win or You’re Out
